channel.title: Amulius 718 - The Ultimate RSPS
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i59.tinypic.com/x5dqxh.png[/img] [url=http://amuliuspvp.co.uk]Website[/url] [url=http://amuliuspvp.co.uk/play]Play[/url] [IMG]http://oi59.tinypic.com/rgy15t.jpg[/img]
Welcome to AmuliusPvP 718, we created this server in 09/02/2015 and we managed to hit around 20 players! This is an absolutely great achievement for the server & staff who have incredible experience in RSPS.
By now you are probably thinking why you should play on this server. Well, AmuliusPvP 718 will offer you some quality gaming experience! We have many creative activities in the server & our developers are awesome and will absolutely deliver awesome updates and joy to the players. I would first like to thank from the bottom of my hearts to all the people supporting this server! which are the players themselves and the amazing people who are able to donate and keep the server alive and running! We appreciate them very much, we wouldn't be here without them, so I would like to thank them very much, from me and the high staff team!
We also have our own community forums which you can check out here: [url=http://amuliuspvp.co.uk/community/]Sign In - AmuliusPvP 718 | Community[/url] This forum helps us to improve the server alot due to the fact that the players themselves get to give suggestions & feedback.
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/v2hsoOm.gif[/img] [U][B]Server Features[/B][/U] Full Godwars- Bandos, Armadyl, Sara, Etc Working Dice Fight Caves- Fully working with 63 waves! Duel Arena- 100% Clean Nex- Working 100% 18+ Bosses 9+ Minigames 6 Quests to-do (KORASI QUEST INCLUDED)! RuneSpan Added Soqual of Fortune 100% 100% Dicing 100% Flower Game 24/7 Dedi Hosted 100% CastleWars 100% Clan Wars Many Moneymaking Ways All working skills (24)! FULLY CONSTRUCTION! 100% Prestige Great PvM System with POINTS! 100% Working Anti-Dupe System 100% Working KQ Automatic Donation : Available Automatic Voting : Available Fairy Rings working Custom Bosses Slayer system lodestone 100% inferno adze 100% Ironman/Normal Player & Player Killer
[B][U]Normal player[/U] - Doesn't have access to the teleport panel, they have to walk to get to their destination. [U]Ironman[/U] - Has access to the teleport panel and so on. [U]Player killer[/U] - Can spawn and have a custom tab but cannot trade or drop[/B]
[IMG]http://oi59.tinypic.com/rgy15t.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[U][B]Media[/B][/U]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/8f89ee136082ca6295905c74edcde4f2.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/53ebc86154f105cf006ec1552c7a3d6e.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/de441fb433bc2046838bb1cbb834611a.gif[/img] [U]Donatorzone[/U] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/ad5201efdbadc7fe64ffb4e17507d1ec.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ot4VJKs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Kwh8ioS.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.title: Amulius 718 - The Ultimate RSPS
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer

@FoHammer wrote:

This server is so terrible, can’t believe the projects still going. I’m still gonna release your source tho so keep working on it.

Read full topic

@kamarscape wrote:

Read full topic

item.title: Amulius 718 - The Ultimate RSPS
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

[quote=“amuliuspvp, post:28, topic:550377”][quote author=wimstr link=topic=669288.msg4483772#msg4483772 date=1432461347]
Fix this damn client man.

-Re-downloaded cache
-Tried different graphic settings, also software, opengl

Still having black screen on log in.
[/quote]

Hi,

There’s nothing wrong with the client, people have been getting this issue lately because of their internet.

You need to wait about 5mins ingame with blackscreen and hopefully it loads.

We have tried upgrading our dedi host, and changing the location, but the problem is not coming from us.[/quote]

I don’t have this issue anywhere else, so it’s not from my side.
There’s more issues with the client that isn’t found elsewhere, for example auto detect graphics gets your black screened.
Direct x doesn’t work, after fetching updates the music stops, screen goes black i waited 5 minutes and it was still black.

Meanwhile i downloaded a different 718 and i had no blackscreen or client issues at all.
So there must be something wrong on your side, even though it may be a minor thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Amulius 718 - The Ultimate RSPS
item.dc:creator: @amuliuspvp amuliuspvp
item.description:
@amuliuspvp wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:27, topic:550377”]Fix this damn client man.

-Re-downloaded cache
-Tried different graphic settings, also software, opengl

Still having black screen on log in.[/quote]

Hi,

There’s nothing wrong with the client, people have been getting this issue lately because of their internet.

You need to wait about 5mins ingame with blackscreen and hopefully it loads.

We have tried upgrading our dedi host, and changing the location, but the problem is not coming from us.

Read full topic

item.title: Amulius 718 - The Ultimate RSPS

item.description:
@amuliuspvp wrote:

QueenBlackDragon Redone
New Clipping System (Took alot of time)
Tons of new familers
Thieving Skill Redon
Woodcutting Skill Redone
Farmining Skill Redone
Fixed Some Packets
Cooking Skill Redone And Added Support For All Food
Fixed Bonfire Glitches/Bugs And Added Support for most of logs
Redone EssenceMining
Redone RefugeOfFear
Added Jem Mining
Fixed Nex Glitches/Bugs
Redone FightCaves
Redone Fightkiln
Redone Hunter Box Action
Removed Flower Minigame (Need to be redone later)
Started rs dungeoneering
Started rs construction
Started rs farming
Started rs slayer
50% Done Dward Cannon
Redoing summoning
Redone FightPits
Redone LivingRockCavern
Fixed RefugeOfFear

item.title: Amulius 718 - The Ultimate RSPS
item.dc:creator: @amuliuspvp amuliuspvp
item.description:
@amuliuspvp wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:8, topic:550377”][quote author=amuliuspvp link=topic=669288.msg4476323#msg4476323 date=1426083808]
HQ Message [11/3/15]

*Added 2 quests in the quest tab
*Fixed so killer cannot trade/drop
*Killers can now spawn with our own item id list.
*G.E 80% Done

We need the players help, we have been adding everything which the players want. But the server is going inactive and inactive. I would just like to thank all the players who have been loyal and has been with us since day 1. It might be because we don’t have many staffs, so now the Amulius HQ staff have decided to open the staff spots, if you’d like to apply -> Sign In - AmuliusPvP 718 | Community Hopefully we can improve the activeness and so on!

~Amulius HQ Staff
[/quote]
When I run the jar, the whole screen goes black after downloading the cache.[/quote]

Hi,

Try again m8, dont forget to wait for the cache to load. That’s what the most players are having problem with. But however we will upgrade in the future.

Read full topic
